about_the_game:
When you're looking for all the hotness, the sauce is boss with the Spicy Bundle!

This Bundle contains:

1700 Spoons to help you upgrade your kitchen equipment;

4 +3 Customers boosts, so you have people to serve when it counts;

4 +30 Seconds boosts, so you can add time to the clock when you need it;

4 Price Doubler boosts that helps you earn more coins;

4 Second Chance boosts to give you a do-over if you make a mistake;

4 Waiter boosts that helps serve your dishes automatically to keep your hands free to cook;

4 Insta-Cook boosts to make your meals in a flash;

4 Burn-Proofer boosts that keeps your food looking fresh if you leave it cooking for too long;

4 Dazzler boosts that can stop everything when the going gets rough.

The Spicy Bundle is the hot deal you need to add some heat to your cooking line!
